p: To quote Charles Nicolle [ 1], it is certain that new epidemics will appear. Mosquitoes and viruses are poised to ambush humans following changes in vector ecosystems [ 49]. The process of establishment may be abrupt and rapid, as was the recent Zika pandemic with Ae. aegypti as vector, or more gradual, going through adapting mechanisms, as was the case with the emergence of the West Nile virus in several temperate cities, particularly in the USA [ 50].
